board: Council of Higher Secondary Education, Odisha
subject: Chemistry

units.unit_name: Solid State, Solutions, Electrochemistry & Chemical Kinetics

topics.title: Solid State
topics.description: Classification of solids, amorphous and crystalline solids, unit cell, packing in solids, voids, point defects, electrical and magnetic properties, band theory of metals.

topics.title: Solutions
topics.description: Types of solutions, concentration, solubility, colligative properties (Raoult’s law, elevation of boiling point, depression of freezing point, osmotic pressure), van't Hoff factor.

topics.title: Electrochemistry
topics.description: Redox reactions, conductance in electrolytic solutions, Kohlrausch’s Law, electrolysis, Galvanic cells, Nernst equation, Gibbs energy, fuel cells, corrosion.

topics.title: Chemical Kinetics
topics.description: Rate of reaction, factors affecting rates, order and molecularity, integrated rate equations, half-life, collision theory, activation energy.

topics.title: Surface Chemistry
topics.description: Adsorption (physisorption and chemisorption), catalysts, colloids, Tyndall effect, Brownian movement, electrophoresis, emulsions.

topics.title: General Principles and Processes of Isolation of Elements
topics.description: Principles of extraction (concentration, oxidation, reduction), refining. Principles of extraction of aluminium, copper, zinc, and iron.

units.unit_name: p, d, f Block Elements & Coordination Compounds

topics.title: p-Block Elements
topics.description: Group 15, 17, and 18 elements: introduction, electronic configuration, properties, preparation of compounds.

topics.title: d and f Block Elements
topics.description: General introduction, properties of transition metals, preparation of K2CrO7 and KMnO4.

topics.title: Coordination Compounds
topics.description: Introduction, ligands, IUPAC nomenclature, Werner’s theory, VBT, CFT, stereoisomerism.

units.unit_name: Organic Chemistry & Chemistry in Everyday Life

topics.title: Haloalkanes and Haloarenes
topics.description: Nomenclature, properties, substitution reactions, environmental effects of common compounds.

topics.title: Alcohols, Phenols and Ethers
topics.description: Nomenclature, preparation, properties, identification of alcohol types, acidic nature of phenol.

topics.title: Aldehydes, Ketones and Carboxylic Acids
topics.description: Nomenclature, preparation, properties, mechanism of nucleophilic addition.

topics.title: Polymers
topics.description: Classification, polymerization, important polymers (polythene, nylon), biodegradable polymers.

topics.title: Chemistry in Everyday life
topics.description: Chemicals in Medicines (analgesics, antibiotics), in Food (preservatives, sweeteners), and Cleansing agents (soaps, detergents).
